text: Anatoliy Yakovych Kuksov (; 21 November 1949 â€“ 4 January 2022) was a Soviet footballer and a Ukrainian coach. He made eight appearances for the Soviet Union national football team in 1972 and also won an Olympic bronze medal in 1972. Kuksov died in Luhansk, Ukraine on 4 January 2022, at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Soviet footballers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Anatoliy Kuksov
